meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of ichthyosaurs.
meanings.sent1: The ichthyosaurian fossils were carefully studied by the scientists.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a large collection of ichthyosaurian skeletons.
meanings.sent3: The ichthyosaurian creature seemed to be smiling in the ancient painting.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were graceful and ichthyosaurian, gliding effortlessly through the water.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the essence of the ichthyosaurian world in vivid detail.

meanings.definition: A member of an extinct group of marine reptiles resembling dolphins.
meanings.sent1: The ichthyosaurian swam swiftly through the prehistoric ocean.
meanings.sent2: Children were fascinated by the ichthyosaurian skeleton at the museum.
meanings.sent3: The ichthyosaurian playfully chased after schools of fish in the ancient seas.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed like the call of an ichthyosaurian in the vast ocean.
meanings.sent5: The ichthyosaurian's sleek body cut through the water with ease.
